MASTER_INTERNAL_ERROR.MSG: An unexpected error has occured in function '{fn}', in file '{file}': {e}.

MASTER_INVALID_PARAM_TYPE.MSG: Parameter '{param}' is of a bad type. Please use a valid type.

MASTER_NOT_LOGGED_IN.MSG: A user must be logged in for this request.

MASTER_OUT_OF_RANGE.MSG: The parameter '{param}' is out of range.
